snippet: Lawyers for the city are investigating whether the benefits of the drugs, known as opioids, were overly promoted while their risks were underplayed.
abstract: Lawyers for the city of Chicago are investigating marketing claims by producers of narcotic painkillers as a prelude to a possible lawsuit against them, focusing on whether manufacturers overstated their benefits and understated their risk; inquiry could lead city to seek recovery of millions spent on pain drugs used to treat city employees and retirees.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the city are investigating whether the benefits of the drugs, known as opioids, were overly promoted while their risks were underplayed.

headline.main: Chicago Said to Weigh Suit Over Marketing of Painkillers
headline.print_headline: Chicago Said to Weigh Suit Over Marketing of Painkillers
